TEXT.English: Greetings, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME]. It is indeed an honor to meet you.
TEXT.Chinese: 欢迎，[CT_NAME]。我是[OUR_NAME]。见到你是我的荣幸。

TEXT.English: Drop dead.
TEXT.Chinese: 去死吧。

TEXT.English: As a friend of mine once said, 'No terms except unconditional and immediate surrender can be accepted.' Pithy, don't you agree?
TEXT.Chinese: 我的一位朋友曾经说过：“立即无条件投降是我唯一可接受的条件。”很精辟，你同意吗？

TEXT.English: Greetings, [CT_NAME]. Sit down and let's chat for a spell.
TEXT.Chinese: 欢迎，[CT_NAME]，请坐，让我们好好谈一会。

TEXT.English: And to what do I owe the dubious honor of your presence?
TEXT.Chinese: 你这人品可疑的家伙到我这里来想要干什么？

TEXT.English: Can you spare this for a good friend, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Chinese: 您能把这个与一位好朋友共享吗，[CT_NAME]?

TEXT.English: Sharing is caring, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Chinese: 分享即是关爱，[CT_NAME]。

TEXT.English: Hand this over or feel the wrath of our 'terrible swift sword.'
TEXT.Chinese: 交出这个，否则就尝尝我们可怕的利剑的味道。

TEXT.English: Greetings, stranger! Gaze in awe on the majesty that is [OUR_CIV_SHORT]!
TEXT.Chinese: 欢迎，陌生人！来心怀敬畏仰视[OUR_CIV_SHORT]的尊荣吧！

TEXT.English: I do not speak to liars and cheats.
TEXT.Chinese: 我可不屑于同骗子交谈。

TEXT.English: There will be no peace until the last [CT_CIV_ADJ] soldier's head is atop a [OUR_CIV_ADJ] spear!
TEXT.Chinese: 在最后一个[CT_CIV_ADJ]士兵的头颅被插在[OUR_CIV_ADJ]的长矛上之前，战争永远不会结束！

TEXT.English: Welcome, friend [CT_NAME]! What can mighty [OUR_CIV_SHORT] do to assist your humble empire?
TEXT.Chinese: 欢迎，我的[CT_NAME]朋友！有什么事情需要伟大的[OUR_CIV_SHORT]的援手才能救助你那渺小的国家？

TEXT.English: Well? Get on with it! I have laws to write!
TEXT.Chinese: 嗯？有话快说！我忙着编撰法典呢！

TEXT.English: We could use your assistance, friend [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Chinese: 我想我们可以恳求您的帮助， [CT_NAME]朋友。

TEXT.English: Can you spare this for a good friend?
TEXT.Chinese: 您能把这个与一位好朋友共享吗？

TEXT.English: Give us this or we shall surely come and take it.
TEXT.Chinese: 把这个送过来，否则我们一定亲自来取，一定。

TEXT.English: Welcome, [CT_NAME]! May the heavens bless you as you deserve to be blessed!
TEXT.Chinese: 欢迎，[CT_NAME]！愿圣灵保佑你，因为你值得保佑。

TEXT.English: No!
TEXT.Chinese: 不！

TEXT.English: Thank you for your kind offer, [CT_NAME], but I believe that I would prefer to wipe your civilization off of the face of the world.
TEXT.Chinese: 感谢您善意的邀请，[CT_NAME]，但是我相信，我更愿意把你和你的文明从地面上抹去。

TEXT.English: You honor [OUR_CIV_SHORT] with your presence, [CT_NAME]. How can we assist you?
TEXT.Chinese: 您的光临令[OUR_CIV_SHORT]倍感荣耀，[CT_NAME]。我们需要怎样做才能帮助您？

TEXT.English: You may skip the pleasantries, [CT_NAME]. Why have you come to mighty [OUR_CIV_SHORT]?
TEXT.Chinese: 不必说虚伪的客套话了，[CT_NAME]，你为什么来拜访强大的[OUR_CIV_SHORT]?

TEXT.English: Could you spare this for us, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Chinese: 您能把这个给一位好朋友享用吗，[CT_NAME]?

TEXT.English: Please give us this, [CT_NAME]. It will help to ensure continued friendship between our two great empires.
TEXT.Chinese: 请把这个给我们，[CT_NAME]。这将有益于维持我们两个伟大帝国的长久友谊。

TEXT.English: Give us what we want, [CT_NAME]. Your armies are no match for ours, and you know it.
TEXT.Chinese: 交出一切我们需要的，[CT_NAME]。你的部队根本不是我们的对手，相信你清楚得很。

TEXT.English: Hail to you, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME], ruler of the god-fearing [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people! May the friendship between our two great civilizations last until we are much, much larger than you!
TEXT.Chinese: 欢迎，[CT_NAME]。我是[OUR_NAME]， 神灵也为之畏惧的[OUR_CIV_ADJ]人民的统治者！愿我们两个文明之间的和平持续到我们的文明远远超过你们！

TEXT.English: Be gone, you heathen fool!
TEXT.Chinese: 滚开，愚蠢的异教徒。

TEXT.English: There shall be no peace until your tortured soul is burning in the fiery pits of the netherworld!
TEXT.Chinese: 除非你那饱受折磨的灵魂在冥府的熔坑里熊熊燃烧，和平永远不会降临！

TEXT.English: May the blessings of Heaven be upon you, [CT_NAME]!
TEXT.Chinese: 愿您浸沐在天堂的圣光中，[CT_NAME]！

TEXT.English: Say what you have come to say, sinful one. I am listening.
TEXT.Chinese: 直截了当地说出你的意图吧，万恶之徒，我在听。

TEXT.English: Pay it forward, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Chinese: 从长远着想，请帮助我们，[CT_NAME]。

TEXT.English: The heavens command that you give us the following, [CT_NAME]. Unless you particularly like thunderbolts I urge you to comply.
TEXT.Chinese: 神灵要求你向我们奉献以下贡品，[CT_NAME]。我建议你还是顺从天命的好，除非，你将享受天打雷劈的感觉。

TEXT.English: Everyone has needs, [CT_NAME]. For example, we need the following, and you need to give it to us.
TEXT.Chinese: 每个人都有他的需求，[CT_NAME]。比方说，我们需要以下列出的贡品，而你只须把它交给我就行了。

TEXT.English: I, [OUR_NAME], possessor of one of the largest and finest noses in human history, welcome you to glorious [OUR_CIV_SHORT]!
TEXT.Chinese: 我，[OUR_NAME]，人类历史上最巨大最灵敏的鼻子的主人，欢迎你来到光荣的[OUR_CIV_SHORT]！

TEXT.English: There is nothing to discuss. Go away now.
TEXT.Chinese: 没有什么值得继续讨论下去，马上从我的眼前消失。

TEXT.English: Certainly not! The honor of [OUR_CIV_SHORT] demands that this war continue until you are ground into very small bits.
TEXT.Chinese: 绝无可能！[OUR_CIV_SHORT]的尊严要求将战争延续到让你灰飞烟灭的那天。

TEXT.English: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. Have you come yet again to admire my heroic profile?
TEXT.Chinese: 欢迎，[CT_NAME]。这次您还是来颂扬我的英雄事迹的吗？

TEXT.English: Say what you have to say, [CT_NAME]. I have no desire to spend any more time with you than absolutely necessary.
TEXT.Chinese: 开门见山地说出你所有想说的话，[CT_NAME]。我很不情愿在花费多于必要的时间和你交涉。

TEXT.English: The honor of [OUR_CIV_SHORT] demands that you provide us with the following. If it isn't too much trouble, that is.
TEXT.Chinese: [OUR_CIV_SHORT]的荣誉要求您提供以下列出的赠礼，如果那对您而言只是举手之劳的话。

TEXT.English: The honor of [OUR_CIV_SHORT] demands that you provide us with the following. We really mean it this time.
TEXT.Chinese: [OUR_CIV_SHORT]的荣誉要求你奉献以下列出的贡品，这次我们是认真的。

TEXT.English: The honor of [OUR_CIV_SHORT] demands that you provide us with the following. Or we'll destroy you.
TEXT.Chinese: [OUR_CIV_SHORT]的荣誉要求你提供以下列出的贡品，否则我们将亲手毁灭你。

TEXT.English: As the leader of ancient [OUR_CIV_SHORT], father and mother of all that is civilized, I, [OUR_NAME], welcome the leader of the upstart [CT_CIV_ADJ] people into my august presence.
TEXT.Chinese: 作为所有文明人的父母之邦——[OUR_CIV_SHORT]的领袖——我[OUR_NAME]欢迎初步脱离野蛮的[CT_CIV_ADJ]人的领袖前来造访。

TEXT.English: No!
TEXT.Chinese: 不！

TEXT.English: Peace? Don't be foolish. There can be no peace between Civilization and Barbarian.
TEXT.Chinese: 和平？别傻了。文明与野蛮之间不可能有和平。

TEXT.English: Have you come again, [CT_NAME]? Wonderful! Let us sit on a log and debate Aristotelian Metaphysics until bedtime, shall we?
TEXT.Chinese: 你又来了，[CT_NAME]？再好不过！让我们并肩坐在同一根圆木上，用一整天时间来探讨亚里士多德的形而上学，怎么样？

TEXT.English: Well? Out with it!
TEXT.Chinese: 嗯？有话快说！

TEXT.English: Mighty [OUR_CIV_SHORT] requests a small token of friendship from its faithful ally, [CT_CIV_SHORT].
TEXT.Chinese: 强大的[OUR_CIV_SHORT]希望忠实的盟友——[CT_CIV_SHORT]向我们赠送一份友谊的信物。

TEXT.English: A truly civilized leader would give us what we want, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Chinese: 一位真正文明的领袖一定会给予我们所要求的东西，对吗[CT_NAME]？

TEXT.English: Beware of Greeks demanding gifts, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Chinese: 请注意，希腊要求你们奉上贡礼，[CT_NAME]。

TEXT.English: May the blessings of Heaven be upon you, [CT_NAME]. I, [OUR_NAME], leader of the puissant [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people, welcome you to our mighty empire.
TEXT.Chinese: 愿上天赐福于你，[CT_NAME]。我，[OUR_NAME]，强盛的[OUR_CIV_ADJ]的领袖，欢迎你造访我的帝国。

TEXT.English: Get out of my sight before I do something extremely undiplomatic.
TEXT.Chinese: 立刻在我眼前消失，否则我将被迫动用某些不合外交礼仪的手段。

TEXT.English: Peace? Not by the hair on my chinny-chin-chin!
TEXT.Chinese: 和平？凭我下巴上的美髯发誓，这是不可能的事！

TEXT.English: We graciously welcome the mighty leader of [OUR_CIV_SHORT] to our presence.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们荣幸地恭迎强大的[OUR_CIV_SHORT]领袖到访。

TEXT.English: What do YOU want, knave?
TEXT.Chinese: 你想要什么，小子？

TEXT.English: Share the wealth a little, willya?
TEXT.Chinese: 让我们分享一点财富，好吗？

TEXT.English: I believe that you'll find it in [CT_CIV_SHORT]'s best interest to supply us with the following.
TEXT.Chinese: 我相信你会了解给予我们下列各项作为贡礼符合[CT_CIV_SHORT]的最大利益。

TEXT.English: Give us what we want and perhaps your heathenish empire will survive another day. Perhaps...
TEXT.Chinese: 交出我们所要求的东西，也许你们这个异端国家能再存活几天。我是说也许……

TEXT.English: I am pleased to meet you, [CT_NAME], and I look forward to many years of peace and friendship between our two great nations.
TEXT.Chinese: 很高兴遇见你，[CT_NAME]，我期待在今后的日子里，我们两个伟大国家之间的和平与友谊能够保持长久。

TEXT.English: Leave me alone, you barbarian cur!
TEXT.Chinese: 离我远一点，你这个野蛮的杂种！

TEXT.English: We do not make peace with barbarians.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们不同野蛮人和谈。

TEXT.English: Welcome, my friend! Let us discuss many things. Here: have a mango.
TEXT.Chinese: 欢迎，我的朋友！让我们来讨论共同关心的所有问题。喏，先吃个芒果吧。

TEXT.English: Well?
TEXT.Chinese: 嗯？

TEXT.English: The [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people could use your assistance, [CT_NAME]. I trust that you won't disappoint them.
TEXT.Chinese: [OUR_CIV_ADJ]人民需要你的帮助，[CT_NAME]。我相信你不会让他们失望的。

TEXT.English: Share the wealth, Baby?
TEXT.Chinese: 让我们分享财富好吗，宝贝？

TEXT.English: You may pay us in treasure today or in blood tomorrow. I strongly recommend the former.
TEXT.Chinese: 你可以在今天付出财宝，或是在明天付出鲜血。我强烈推荐你选择前者。

TEXT.English: I greet you, [CT_NAME]. [OUR_CIV_SHORT] is mighty - deal with us fairly and you will prosper. Attack us and our temples will run red with the blood of your warriors!
TEXT.Chinese: 向你致意，[CT_NAME]。[OUR_CIV_SHORT]是如此强大——如果与我们友好相处，你们的国家也将繁荣昌盛。如果向我们发动攻击，你们士兵的鲜血将染红我们的神庙！

TEXT.English: No! I am far too important to speak with you!
TEXT.Chinese: 不！我还得处理更重要的事务，没空与你交谈！

TEXT.English: Peace now? You've got to be kidding me!
TEXT.Chinese: 现在想要和平了？你一定是在开玩笑！

TEXT.English: I greet my friend and almost equal, [CT_NAME]. And what present shall you give us today?
TEXT.Chinese: 欢迎我的朋友，[CT_NAME]。今天你给我们带来了什么礼物？

TEXT.English: Come to grovel at our feet, eh? Well, go ahead.
TEXT.Chinese: 来向我们摇尾乞怜吗？好啊，请说吧。

TEXT.English: [CT_NAME], a war between our two great people is to be avoided at all costs, wouldn't you agree? So pay up.
TEXT.Chinese: [CT_NAME]，我们应该不惜付出一切以避免我们两个伟大民族之间发生战争，你同意吗？那就请付出吧。

TEXT.English: Giving us what we want is the only way to avoid immediate destruction. Pay up.
TEXT.Chinese: 交出我们想要的东西是避免即刻毁灭的唯一方法。快交出来。

TEXT.English: Give us what we want or die.
TEXT.Chinese: 或者交出我们想要的东西，或者去死。

TEXT.English: The great [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people welcome you, [CT_NAME]. Would it be politically correct to offer you a peace-pipe?
TEXT.Chinese: 伟大的[OUR_CIV_ADJ]人民欢迎你，[CT_NAME]。送你一支“和平烟斗”应该不会带给你政治麻烦吧？

TEXT.English: I don't speak with liars. Now scram.
TEXT.Chinese: 我不同撒谎者交谈。快滚。

TEXT.English: This war will end when I decide it will end, and not a moment before.
TEXT.Chinese: 这场战争将在我决定结束它的时候结束，绝不会提前片刻。

TEXT.English: Welcome, my friend! You are indeed wise to seek the council of your betters.
TEXT.Chinese: 欢迎，我的朋友！与强者交往确实是你明智的选择。

TEXT.English: What could you possibly say that would be of even the slightest interest to me?
TEXT.Chinese: 你可否拿出一个能令我稍微感兴趣一点的话题来商谈呢？

TEXT.English: Would you care to share some of your wealth with your good friends and allies, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Chinese: 你可否让你的好朋友及同盟者与你共享部分财富呢，[CT_NAME]？

TEXT.English: For the sake of the continued friendship between our two great peoples, I request the following token of appreciation.
TEXT.Chinese: 为了我们两个伟大民族之间长期的友谊，我要求以下各项作为酬谢。

TEXT.English: It is unwise to deny a hungry bear its food, [CT_NAME]. You're liable to get mauled.
TEXT.Chinese: 拒绝向饥饿的熊提供食物是不明智的行为，[CT_NAME]。你一定会弄到头破血流。

TEXT.English: I am honored to meet you, [CT_NAME]. I hope that our two nations will be able to live in peace and friendship.
TEXT.Chinese: 很荣幸认识你，[CT_NAME]。我希望我们两国能够长久友好和平地相处。

TEXT.English: No!
TEXT.Chinese: 不！

TEXT.English: Certainly not. The war will continue until we have achieved total victory.
TEXT.Chinese: 绝无可能。一旦我们取得完全胜利，战争自然会结束。

TEXT.English: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. I can always spare a few moments to converse with friends and allies.
TEXT.Chinese: 欢迎，[CT_NAME]。我始终愿意腾出些时间和朋友或盟友交谈。

TEXT.English: I'm listening.
TEXT.Chinese: 我在听。

TEXT.English: Can you spare us this, [CT_NAME]? I would be extremely grateful for your assistance.
TEXT.Chinese: 能把这个送给我们吗，[CT_NAME]？我将对您的帮助感激涕零。

TEXT.English: It would be diplomatically expedient to give us what we want, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Chinese: 算是外交上的权宜之计，交出我们所需要的一切，怎么样[CT_NAME]？

TEXT.English: Time to pay the piper, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Chinese: 是时候结算了，[CT_NAME]。

TEXT.English: Well met, [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME] the Magnificent. Come - sit and bathe in my glory while we discuss many things.
TEXT.Chinese: 你好，[CT_NAME]！我是伟大的[OUR_NAME]。来，请坐，在我们讨论事务时好好享受我的荣耀的沐浴吧。

TEXT.English: Not a chance.
TEXT.Chinese: 没有任何可能。

TEXT.English: That would be unwise at the moment. The war shall continue.
TEXT.Chinese: 就目前而言，这是一个不明智的决策。战争必将延续。

TEXT.English: My palace is always open to you, [CT_NAME], oh wise and generous leader of [CT_CIV_SHORT].
TEXT.Chinese: 我的宫殿始终对您开放，[CT_NAME]，睿智而慷慨的[CT_CIV_SHORT]领袖.

TEXT.English: Well? Get on with it! Every moment that I spend gazing upon your wizened visage is painful to me.
TEXT.Chinese: 嗯？有话快说！每次看到你那干瘪的脸都让我难受。

TEXT.English: Would you care to give [OUR_CIV_SHORT] a small token of your affection, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Chinese: 您不介意赠予[OUR_CIV_SHORT]一份您影响力的象征吧，[CT_NAME]？

TEXT.English: It is wise for inferior cultures to shower their betters with gifts, don't you think?
TEXT.Chinese: 对于劣等的文明，没有什么能比向优越文明进贡礼品更明智的事了，难道你不是这样认为的吗？

TEXT.English: Our protection comes at a price, [CT_NAME]. Pay up or suffer the consequences.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的保护是有偿的，[CT_NAME]。快付保护费，否则等着瞧。

TEXT.English: I, [OUR_NAME], welcome [CT_NAME], ruler of the upstart nation of [CT_CIV_SHORT].
TEXT.Chinese: 我，[OUR_NAME]，快速崛起的[CT_CIV_SHORT]的统治者，欢迎你，[CT_NAME]。

TEXT.English: I will not speak with you!
TEXT.Chinese: 我懒得和你说话。

TEXT.English: Grovel all you want, [CT_NAME]. It will not save your pitiful people from their destruction!
TEXT.Chinese: 你可以到处去认主人，[CT_NAME]。但即使那样也没法帮助你可怜的民族逃离毁灭的命运！

TEXT.English: Back again, eh? What is it this time?
TEXT.Chinese: 您又回来了吗？这次您带来了什么？

TEXT.English: Well look what the goat dragged in.
TEXT.Chinese: 让我们看看这头山羊拖来了什么？

TEXT.English: We need this. Now. Thank you for your cooperation.
TEXT.Chinese: 现在我们需要这个，我们会感谢您的合作的。

TEXT.English: You should give us what we want, [CT_NAME] - your people's future depends upon it.
TEXT.Chinese: 你应该给我们这个，[CT_NAME]，这决定了你的人民的未来。

TEXT.English: I'm all about the bling, [CT_NAME]. Hand it over or suffer the consequences.
TEXT.Chinese: 我有意炫耀我的力量，[CT_NAME]。交出来，否则后果自负。

TEXT.English: Congratulations, [CT_NAME]! At last your explorations have led you to me!
TEXT.Chinese: 恭喜，[CT_NAME]！不懈的探索终于让我们走到了一起。

TEXT.English: Go away, you vile person!
TEXT.Chinese: 离我远点，你这个邪恶的家伙！

TEXT.English: Not while there are still so many [CT_CIV_ADJ] warriors to slaughter!
TEXT.Chinese: 当还有如此多的[CT_CIV_ADJ]战士可以屠杀时，我当然会说不！

TEXT.English: I greet you with effusive ebullience, my good friend.
TEXT.Chinese: 见到你真让我高兴，请接受最隆重的欢迎，我的好朋友。

TEXT.English: What now?
TEXT.Chinese: 现在你想说什么？

TEXT.English: If it pleases you, [CT_NAME], [OUR_CIV_SHORT] could use a little assistance.
TEXT.Chinese: 如果不扫兴的话，[CT_NAME]，[OUR_CIV_SHORT]希望获得您的帮助。

TEXT.English: We could use your aid, [CT_NAME]. Can you spare us this?
TEXT.Chinese: 我想我们可以请求你的帮助，[CT_NAME]。能把这个让给我们吗？

TEXT.English: [CT_NAME], I'm making you an offer you can't refuse.
TEXT.Chinese: [CT_NAME]，我提出的可是一份你没有任何理由拒绝的建议。

TEXT.English: Welcome, puny mortal. I am [OUR_NAME], divine leader of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. How can you assist me?
TEXT.Chinese: 欢迎，瘦弱的凡人。我是[OUR_NAME]，[OUR_CIV_SHORT]神圣的领袖。 你愿意如何协助我？

TEXT.English: No! Your prayers will remain unanswered!
TEXT.Chinese: 不行！你的祈祷还没有得到神的回应！

TEXT.English: This war will continue until my divine bloodlust is completely sated.
TEXT.Chinese: 这场战争没有结束的可能，直到神授于我的嗜杀天性也为之反胃之时。

TEXT.English: You are truly blessed to come once more into my divine presence, [CT_NAME]. I assume that you've brought gifts?
TEXT.Chinese: 你一定是被神明所指引，再次前来仰望我天神般的仪态的，[CT_NAME]。我想，你一定没有忘记带礼物来吧？

TEXT.English: Speak quickly before I open a big old can of divine wrath on you, false one!
TEXT.Chinese: 快点把话讲完，口蜜腹剑的家伙！免得我召唤古老强大的天惩降到你头上。

TEXT.English: Even the most inferior culture may have something to contribute to [OUR_CIV_SHORT]'s greatness, [CT_NAME]. For example:
TEXT.Chinese: 即使是最低劣的文明也能奉献有价值的东西来彰显[OUR_CIV_SHORT]的伟大，[CT_NAME]，比如说这些：

TEXT.English: Decide now, [CT_NAME]: deal, or no deal.
TEXT.Chinese: 快做决定，[CT_NAME]：同意，还是不同意。

TEXT.English: If you wish for your puny civilization to survive, I urge you to make a small donation to us. Immediately.
TEXT.Chinese: 如果你企望让你孱弱的文明苟延残喘，我建议你还是向我们进献些小小的贡品，快作决定。

TEXT.English: Welcome, [CT_NAME]! Mighty [OUR_CIV_SHORT] seeks peace with your weak little civilization. For the moment, that is.
TEXT.Chinese: 欢迎，[CT_NAME]！强大的[OUR_CIV_SHORT]依然寻求和你那弱小的文明维持和平，当然，仅仅是暂时的。

TEXT.English: Go away before I throw you to the badgers!
TEXT.Chinese: 在我动念把你扔到獾群中前，赶紧滚！

TEXT.English: Don't make me laugh!
TEXT.Chinese: 别引我发笑！

TEXT.English: Greetings, [CT_NAME]! Let us mount my mighty chariot and hunt down some barbarians! You can ride "shotgun!"
TEXT.Chinese: 欢迎，[CT_NAME]！让我们驾着我精良的战车猎杀野蛮人吧！嗯，我允许你使用“猎枪”!

TEXT.English: Go ahead: Make my day.
TEXT.Chinese: 快说，别让我耗上一天。

TEXT.English: Could you spare your good friends a small gift?
TEXT.Chinese: 您能给好朋友一份小礼物吗？

TEXT.English: Give us this, [CT_NAME]. Frankly you need all of the friends you can get.
TEXT.Chinese: 给我们这个，[CT_NAME]。坦率地说，你需要拉拢所有可能的盟友。

TEXT.English: Give until it hurts, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Chinese: 交出一切，即使你心痛肉痛，[CT_NAME]。
